Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Estus was a Human male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra during the Galactic War. He was among the casualties during the invasion of the Imperial Headquarters in the city of Sobrik.
Estus appears as a named enemy in the Imperial Headquarters, a location in the Republic version of Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
